nodes.text: Flameout was a mixed alcoholic drink that consisted in Hull stripper and Vaschean rye served in a jet-juice flask. It could also be spiked with spice. When R2-D2 was briefly forced to work as an ambulatory bar aboard Jabba the Hutt's sail barge Khetanna, he notably served flameouts. The drink was among several mixed alcoholic beverages served on Tatooine at Chalmun's Cantina in Mos Eisley's spaceport.
